Hello,

I am selling a TurnKeyInternet Professional 1 Account for $70

The full detail are here - http://turnkeyinternet.net/cybermonday/turbo-linux-reseller-hosting/

You'll get the Reseller account and WHMCS for 1 year.

If you would like the domain linked to the account (servaman.com) I can include that and a wildcard SSL (*.servaman.com) for an extra $20

There is an SSL cert but it has already been activated.

I have contacted TurnKeyInternet to see if account services are transferable, their not although they said that I can change all the details on the account to match the new account holder.

Please PM me if interested.
